title: Revitalisation potion (Dragon Slayer II)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Revitalisation potions can be found in a crate on Brundt's ship when sailing to Ungael during Dragon Slayer II. They are used to heal injured Fremennik warriors if they get hit with dragon fire.

content:
Revitalisation potion
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
Quest itemDragon Slayer II
Properties

DestroyDrop
ExamineHelps people feel better.
Values
Value1 coin
AlchemyNot alchemisable
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID22096

Revitalisation potions can be found in a crate on Brundt's ship when sailing to Ungael during Dragon Slayer II. They are used to heal injured Fremennik warriors if they get hit with dragon fire.

'''Revitalisation potions''' can be found in a crate on [[Brundt]]'s ship when sailing to [[Ungael]] during [[Dragon Slayer II]]. They are used to heal injured Fremennik warriors if they get hit with dragon fire.
